overview: A film which reenacts images taken by Paul Fusco of the train voyage that transported Robert Kennedyâ€™s corpse from New York to Washington D.C. on June 8, 1968. The film takes the point of view of the dead, a tracking shot moves through rural and urban American landscapes. People who have come to pay their respects line the tracks, staring as if in an immobile trance.
title: June 8, 1968
